programme.title: Francis Perkins and the US deficit
programme.short_synopsis: Francis Perkins memoires, and an analysis of Reagan's plan to reduce the deficit.
programme.medium_synopsis: A profile of Francis Perkins, the first woman cabinet officer in America, and columnist William Safire's grim evaluation of President Reagan's plan for the mounting US deficit.
